name: tangling-hair

effect.sun_moon: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.

short_effect: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.
